0.content: With the data at hand, we can move forward and define the user's pain points? How can we go about it?

1.content: We can create a user persona together! That way, everyone will have the same idea of who the users are.

5.content: Why the silence, is something wrong?

6.content: I don't think we are familiar with how to create a user persona, or know what a user persona even is, in fact.

7.content: Oh haha! No worries. It's quite simple actually, let me explain.

8.content: Personas are semi-fictional archetypes based on real users that represent a group of users. This persona will be presented in a short document and reflect background information of users, such as behaviours, goals, skills, motivations, pain points, etc.

9.content: Creating user personas helps the team gain a deeper understanding of the target audience. It helps us build empathy with the users, acting as a directional guide to make better decisions!

10.content: I see, that's great to know! Let us create our user persona together.
